summary: Donald Henry Pleasence OBE  was an English actor.
full_text: Donald Henry Pleasence, OBE  was an English film, television, and stage actor. His most notable film roles include psychiatrist Dr. Sam Loomis in most of the Halloween series, the villain Ernst Stavro Blofeld in the James Bond film You Only Live Twice, RAF Flight Lieutenant Colin Blythe in The Great Escape, and Cul-de-sac.
title: Donald Pleasence
